name: The Elements Lord
description:
Become the master of elements! Roll the die in The Elements Lord and fight with whatever you get! Will you be able to defeat the final boss of the cube arena, or will you fall trying?

  The game is made for the GMTK 2022 Game Jam. All the programming was done by me and all the art was done by my friend in 48 hours. The game may be buggy, so sorry for that)).

  Credits: BigSoundBank, Zapsplat.  Amazing sites with awesome sounds!
